# receiveMessage(using:messageID:)

**Instance Method**

Retrieves an MMS message that matches the given identifiers.

## Declaration

```swift
final func receiveMessage(using cellularServiceID: CellularServiceID, messageID: MMSMessageID) async throws -> MMSMessage
```

## Parameters

- **cellularServiceID**: The service identifier to use for this request.
- **messageID**: The message identifier for the target message.

## Return Value

The message matching the specified identifiers.

## Discussion

You get the `cellularServiceID` and `messageID` from an [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/IncomingMessageNotification] that you receive from the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/incomingMessageNotifications] asynchronous sequence.
title: receiveMessage(using:messageID:)
